name: G-Dev. Rush
description:
This was created for the Blackthornprod game Jam.

It's still not a 100 % completed. I tried my best to finish it and to submit it before the deadline so I couldn't finish it completely but the idea of this game is complete. 

since the Theme was Game Dev. I made enemies like Coding as a bug that flies and attacks the hero since learning to code games can sometimes be hard. the same goes for learning how to draw.  but of course the list goes on sometimes developers can't get ideas or can't be creative with their ideas. but anyways I'm glad I got the chance to participate.
